attributes.action: NHS workers bonuses due to COVID-19
attributes.additional_details:
Can you please discuss and do everything to give to any of NHS workers some bonus regarding COVID-19 because when was that quarantine all of self employed was staying and hiding at home 
At this time all NHS workers was working hard to safe their life.
Now the same self employ doesn’t want to work
